QuestData.Title: The Death of Me
QuestData.Description: I have resolved to remove this spear from my side.$b$bFor this, I require your assistance. Your grasping hands are stronger than mine.
QuestData.RewardText: By removing this spear, I have truly guaranteed my own death.$b$bThis does not frighten me.$b$bI would sooner die than live carrying the weapon of my enemy.
